alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Hermosa Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 14 at 7:51PM MST until February 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...North winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...The Custer County Plains and the Hermosa Foot Hills. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Hermosa Foot Hills
